title: Show 172 - Ed Davey
itunes:title: Show 172 - Ed Davey
itunes:subtitle: In the second of two Lib Dem Leadership Specials,â€¦
description:
In the second of two Lib Dem Leadership Specials, Ed Davey delivers his leadership pitch and reflects on his time in government. He gives an impassioned critique of the government's handling of the coronavirus pandemic, especially on care home deaths. Ed also underlines his own liberal philosophy and how it would apply to future public health challenges. Follow Ed on Twitter here: @EdwardJDavey Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde Email the show: politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com For the latest UK Government advice on coronavirus go to: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
